snippet: Good news from the Institute for Supply Management on more rapid growth among American service businesses offset bad news from overseas.
abstract: Stock market ekes out slim gains, held back by worries from overseas.
lead_paragraph: Good news from the Institute for Supply Management on more rapid growth among American service businesses offset bad news from overseas.

headline.main: Shares Advance Only Narrowly After Concerns From Abroad
headline.print_headline: Shares Advance Only Narrowly After Concerns From Abroad
